entities.name: diddy
entities.description: Diddy is Harry's nickname, mentioned by Aunt Petunia in her agitated state. ("DIDDY! Diddy, what’s the matter with you?")

entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Vernon is Harry's uncle, who comes out of the living room to help Aunt Petunia and Dudley. ("Harry’s uncle came galumphing out of the living room...")

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is Harry's aunt, who is worried about Dudley being ill. ("He hurried forward to help Aunt Petunia negotiate a weak-kneed Dudley over the threshold...")

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin, who is described as weak-kneed and being helped by Uncle Vernon. ("He hurried forward to help Aunt Petunia negotiate a weak-kneed Dudley over the threshold...")

entities.name: polkiss
entities.description: Mrs. Polkiss is mentioned as possibly giving something foreign for tea to Harry. ("Did Mrs. Polkiss give you something foreign for tea?")

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon helps Aunt Petunia negotiate Dudley over the threshold. ("He hurried forward to help Aunt Petunia negotiate a weak-kneed Dudley over the threshold...")
Uncle Vernon helps Dudley, who is described as weak-kneed. ("He hurried forward to help Aunt Petunia negotiate a weak-kneed Dudley over the threshold...")
Aunt Petunia is worried about Dudley being ill. ("He’s ill, Vernon!")
Uncle Vernon suspects Mrs. Polkiss of giving something foreign for tea to Harry. ("Did Mrs. Polkiss give you something foreign for tea?")
